function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Time-dependent simulation model for measuring resilience indicators of railway transportation system","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of fuzzy cognitive maps fcm could lead to inaccurate representation of causal reasoning for engineering resilience factors.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate assessment of infrastructure resilience through fuzzy architecture could lead to flawed decision-making.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative assessments of organizational resilience factors may overlook critical quantitative indicators, leading to biased ranking.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of planning and resource allocation may decrease system resilience to disruptive events and impede recovery.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Interdependencies among infrastructure systems can impact the resilience of other systems.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of implementation of standards and guidelines for resilience in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of tangible resource allocation models for resilience planning","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unexplored tradeoffs among the dimensions of resilience","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of data-driven standards ensuring resilience","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of preparedness plans in hospitals","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Rise in the number of infected nurses and physicians","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unprecedented professional, social, and psychological challenges for nurses","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate preparation for each pandemic wave","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective use of hotlines and sponsored advertisements for disease education","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of global coordination and response to pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High rate of covid-19 infections","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Challenges in crisis management","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of coordination between nurses and doctors","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Nurse managers and healthcare personnel being exposed to covid-19 in the hospital environment","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Qualitative approach leading to potential bias in the study results","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Overwhelmed healthcare system due to pandemic management challenges","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Purposive sampling technique used to select diverse participants may not fully represent the population and lead to biased results.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Direct communication and in-person interviews may increase the risk of disease transmission between researchers and participants.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Data collection conducted during the pandemic may be influenced by the rapidly evolving nature of the situation, leading to time-dependent biases.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases during semi-structured interviews in hospital settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of data contamination due to potential exposure to infectious agents","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential impact on public health due to unmitigated disease transmission in hospital settings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 crisis management plan in the healthcare setting","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Psychological problems among nursing staff","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of covid-19 crisis management plan","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absenteeism and presenteeism among nurses","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Infection among nurses","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nurses experiencing psychological problems during covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fear of infection leading to panic emotions, anxiety, and depression","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient nursing knowledge about the coronavirus","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nurses working long hours in isolation facilities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nursing shortage due to the covid-19 pandemic crisis","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate hospital preparation for the coronavirus pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of trained rapid-response team to deal with suspected cases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate infection control measures for medical staff and patients","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of proper equipment in ambulances and morgues for infection control","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adequate training and education for healthcare teams on dealing with covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate isolation facilities and organizational support in hospitals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Multiple zones in the hospital may lead to cross-contamination if not managed effectively.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate communication and collaboration may lead to confusion and errors in patient care.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective communication and collaboration among healthcare professionals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to preventive supplies and antiseptics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of support for isolated workers and those with chronic diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of pandemic preparedness plan","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
